research_project_title.ja: 前方後円墳の設計原理

description.ja: 前方後円墳の三次元計測にもとづき、墳丘の設計原理の検討を行う。墳丘は、中国由来の尺度である尺や歩を用いて精巧に設計されている。そうした設計原理がどのように変化し、各地域に伝えられたのかを検討する。

research_project_title.en: Construction Design of keyhole-shaped burial mounds

description.en: The purpose of the research is to restore the construction design of keyhole-shaped burial mounds based on the newly acquired three dimensional survey data. Each mound was elaborately designed using a unit measure of "syaku" and "bu"(six times as long as "syaku") which came to Japan from China.The process of change and the way of diffusion of the construction design is a task for the future.
